title: The Bucks Destroy the Hawks and Why Are Young Players Succeeding in the Playoffs? | The Answer
description:
Seerat is joined by the Ringer's Rob Mahoney to break down the Bucks' beat down of the Hawks in Game 2 (0:51) and take some listener questions (38:40). Then Chris and Seerat talk about the success that young players have had so far in the playoffs (57:08).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Guest: Rob Mahoney
Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
